title: Gamer Horthy: Improved Hungary
summary: Gamer Horthy: Improved Hungary is a Hearts of Iron IV mod that adds a new focus tree and various mechanics for Hungary.
cover: Mikl√≥s Horthy was a monolithic figure in interwar Hungary, to the point that I have jokingly dubbed him a "gamer." This should not be taken to mean that I condone all of his actions.
sections: I will eventually write something more descriptive here.
